pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quadratic Programming Solver using the 'OSQP' Library // Provides bindings to the 'OSQP' solver. The 'OSQP' solver is a numerical optimization package or solving convex quadratic programs written in 'C' and based on the alternating direction method of multipliers, 'ADMM'. B. Stellato, G. Banjac, P. Goulart, A. Bemporad, S. Boyd (2018) arXiv:1711.08013.
